author: Reuters Editorial
title: Jaish al-Islam to leave Douma in return for releasing prisoners - state TV
text:
BEIRUT (Reuters) - An agreement has been reached to release all prisoners held by Syrian rebels controlling the eastern Ghouta city of Douma in return for the fightersâ€™ leaving the city, Syrian state television reported on Sunday, citing an official source.
According to the agreement, Jaish al-Islam fighters will leave Douma for the northern city of Jarablus, near the borders with Turkey, within 48 hours, the source added.
There was no immediate comment from Jaish al-Islam.
Reporting by Dahlia Nehme; editing by Larry King
